ping_command_description: Displays bot latency and system information.
setprefix_command_description: Sets the bot prefix for this server.
setprefix_response_success: New prefix for this server set to `{prefix}`.
setprefix_response_guild_only: This command can only be used in a server.
getprefix_command_description: Displays the current bot prefix for this server.
getprefix_response_current: The current prefix for this server is `{prefix}`.
getprefix_response_no_custom: This server does not have a custom prefix set. Default is `{default_prefix}`.
getprefix_response_guild_only: This command can only be used in a server.
button_test_command_description: Sends a message with a button.
select_test_command_description: Sends a message with a select menu.
modal_test_command_description: Displays a modal for entering information.
modal_error: An error occurred while submitting the modal.
error_command_not_found: That command was not found. Please check your spelling.
error_bad_argument: Invalid argument type. Please enter a valid value.
error_missing_permissions: You do not have permission to run this command.
error_bot_missing_permissions: The bot does not have permission to run this command.
error_command_on_cooldown: This command is on cooldown. Please wait {retry_after:.2f} seconds.
error_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact the developer.
